title: Populate submission/app details directly from Manifest
body:
Having to RE enter things like version number, application name, etc when submitting a new app is just grounds for making mistakes.
In the App manifest I've already put the version number, and I've already put the application name. When I upload this XAP to the store, look at the manifest and pre-populate the corresponding fields in my submission instead of giving me a chance to mismatch them.

comments.body: THIS. Why on earth is this not a feature already?
